thread.title: Claire M.
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Claire M.

author: Claire M.
title: Claire M.
text: I just ordered a large amount of t-shirts (800) from rush order tees and it couldn't have gone any smoother. I worked primarily with Henry McGuigan and he was fantastic. He was able to get the shirt designed exactly how I wanted it and everything was sent to me about a week after I placed the order. I would highly recommend using rush order tees for designing and creating your custom shirt.
